# abstract

Summaries and plots for dataset.

```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
name <- "airmiles"
cat(sprintf("# %s\n", name))

## summary of airmiles

```{r, echo=FALSE}
load("./dataset/airmiles/data.rda")
summary(data)
```

## plot of airmiles

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plot(data)
```
